item.description:
Manchester Raw Vegan Meetup
Hosting
“A No Holds Barred” Presentation
By Daniel Vitalis
Daniel has been at the forefront of unlocking the mysteries of superior health and nutritional practices for 15 years. He is a dynamic, entertaining speaker who delivers leading edge (and sometimes controversial) information with a unique style and unforgettable humor. If you appreciate David Wolfe you will appreciate Daniel Vitalis and all of his wisdom.
Daniel is the creator of:
• Daniel Vitalis.com
• The Elixir Craft Program
• Findaspring.com
• SurThrival
• Summit Springs Raw Water
• and many more projects
Daniel is in the northeast only until the end of January when he leaves to travel the world on speaking engagements. Don’t miss out! Seating is limited. As an added bonus Daniel will have his products available for sale.

$10 plus bring a dish / $25 if you want Chef KO Bisson to prepare a dish for you. If so call KO 603-622-9505.
Children are free.

6:30 pm 1/15/2009
Best Western Hotel
13500 South willow St
603-627-2525

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food January Meetup
